title: Got killed by an invisible Katarina today.
body:
I was trying to auto-kite her and she turned invisible near brush behind blue heading towards death brush near Dragon, she said she was flying really high through the air on her screen so I think something to do with a spell cast on her or something, but I died because I couldn't actually target her with Vayne auto's.

I've had Ezreal ulti's bug too against Fizz and go straight through him, I think his playful trickster bugs out his hitboxes or something, it's happened to me twice.

And then there's the invisible Nidalee spears all the time.

Riot pls.

replies.body: He's talking about something like this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-nEChzaky4
Nah it was a bug cause Champion glitched out and was a million miles in the air on her screen and on my screen I couldn't see her.
